public class DerbyDatabase
extends AbstractDatabase

Implements support for in-memory Apache Derby databases.

Constructor Detail

DerbyDatabase

public DerbyDatabase(String database,
                     String username,
                     String password)
The constructor for this object stores the database name, user name and password that will be used to create connections.

Parameters:
database - The database name.
username - The user name for the database connection.
password - The password for the database connection.

           throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException
Start the in-memory Apache Derby database.

Parameters:

shutdown

public void shutdown(Logger logger)
              throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException
Shutdown the in-memory HSQLDB database by sending it a SHUTDOWN command.

Parameters:
logger - Used to report errors and raise exceptions.
Throws:
org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException - If there was an error trying to shutdown the database.
